pearl.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small round white object that forms inside an oyster, and is a valuable jewel
pearl.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a string of pearls (=a necklace made of pearls)
pearl.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a hard shiny substance of various colours formed inside some shellfish, which is used for making buttons or to make objects look attractive
pearl.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a small round drop of liquid
pearl.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: the pearls of the morning dew
pearl.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: someone or something that is especially good or valuable
